name: Redemption (itch) (JuckzGames)
description:
Howdy!

This amazing game is being developed for the  30 Days RPG Maker RTP Game Jam. As such, don't expect a super duper incredible game. Expect a fun game (at least it's fun to me).

Anyways... The story is still under development, so I can't really tell that much about it. However what I can tell is that I plan to add some sort of world domination/conquest with armies and such (heavily based Legion Saga series - if you haven't played, you should. amazing game series).

Fair warning: I suck at balancing the difficulty of the game so, it may be too easy or too hard sometimes, please bear with me, I'm learning.

If you have any tips, suggestions, bugs to report send me a message here or at contato@juckzgames.com.br
